[This impressive person]2001-this impressive person said to the bewildered [Syme]93-syme

" Refreshments are provided for [you]93-syme in [[your]93-syme room]3427-your room . "[2001-this impressive person]

[Syme]93-syme , under the influence of the same mesmeric sleep of amazement , went up [the large oaken stairs]2002-the large oaken stairs after [the respectful attendant]2003-the respectful attendant . [He]93-syme entered [a splendid suite of apartments that seemed to be designed specially for [him]93-syme]2004-a splendid suite of apartments that seemed to be designed specially for him . [He]93-syme walked up to a long mirror with the ordinary instinct of [[his]93-syme class]2005-his class , to pull [his]93-syme tie straight or to smooth [his]93-syme hair ; and there [he]93-syme saw the frightful figure that [he]93-syme was blood running down [his]93-syme face from where the bough had struck [him]93-syme , [his]93-syme hair standing out like yellow rags of rank grass , [his]93-syme clothes torn into long , wavering tatters . At once the whole enigma sprang up , simply as the question of how [he]93-syme had got [there]2155-there , and how [he]93-syme was to get out again . Exactly at the same moment [a man in blue , who had been appointed as [[his]93-syme valet]2008-his valet]2007-a man in blue , who had been appointed as his valet , said very solemnly

" [I]2007-a man in blue , who had been appointed as his valet have put out [your]93-syme clothes , [sir]2203-sir . "[2007-a man in blue , who had been appointed as his valet]

" Clothes ! "[93-syme] said [Syme]93-syme sardonically . " [I]93-syme have no clothes except these , "[93-syme] and [he]93-syme lifted two long strips of [his]93-syme frock - coat in fascinating festoons , and made a movement as if to twirl like [a ballet girl]2009-a ballet girl .

" [[My]2010-the attendant master]3419-my master asks [me]2010-the attendant to say , "[2010-the attendant] said [the attendant]2010-the attendant , " that there is a fancy dress ball tonight , and that [he]3419-my master desires [you]93-syme to put on the costume that [I]2010-the attendant have laid out . Meanwhile , [sir]2203-sir , there is a bottle of Burgundy and some cold pheasant , which [he]3419-my master hopes [you]93-syme will not refuse , as it is some hours before supper . "[2010-the attendant]

" Cold pheasant is a good thing , "[93-syme] said [Syme]93-syme reflectively , " and Burgundy is a spanking good thing . But really [I]93-syme do not want either of [them]3431-them so much as [I]93-syme want to know what the devil all this means , and what sort of costume [you]93-syme have got laid out for [me]93-syme . Where is it ? "[93-syme]

[The servant]2011-the servant lifted off a kind of ottoman a long peacock - blue drapery , rather of the nature of a domino , on the front of which was emblazoned a large golden sun , and which was splashed here and there with flaming stars and crescents .

" [You]93-syme 're to be dressed as Thursday , [sir]2203-sir , "[2012-the valet] said [the valet]2012-the valet somewhat affably .

" Dressed as [Thursday]102-thursday ! "[93-syme] said [Syme]93-syme in meditation . " It does n't sound a warm costume . "[93-syme]

" Oh , yes , [sir]2203-sir , "[2013-the other eagerly] said [the other eagerly]2013-the other eagerly , " the Thursday costume is quite warm , [sir]2203-sir . It fastens up to the chin . "[2013-the other eagerly]

" Well , [I]93-syme do n't understand anything , "[93-syme] said [Syme]93-syme , sighing . " [I]93-syme have been used so long to uncomfortable adventures that comfortable adventures knock [me]93-syme out . Still , [I]93-syme may be allowed to ask why [I]93-syme should be particularly like [Thursday]102-thursday in a green frock spotted all over with the sun and moon . Those orbs , [I]93-syme think , shine on other days . [I]93-syme once saw the moon on Tuesday , [I]93-syme remember . "[93-syme]

" Beg pardon , [sir]2203-sir , "[2012-the valet] said [the valet]2012-the valet , " Bible also provided for [you]2203-sir , "[2012-the valet] and with a respectful and rigid finger [he]2012-the valet pointed out a passage in the first chapter of Genesis . [Syme]93-syme read it wondering . It was that in which the fourth day of the week is associated with the creation of the sun and moon . Here , however , [they]2015-they reckoned from a Christian Sunday .

" This is getting wilder and wilder , "[93-syme] said [Syme]93-syme , as [he]93-syme sat down in a chair . " Who are [these people who provide cold pheasant and Burgundy , and green clothes and Bibles]3436-these people who provide cold pheasant and burgundy , and green clothes and bibles ? Do [they]3436-these people who provide cold pheasant and burgundy , and green clothes and bibles provide everything ? "[93-syme]

" Yes , [sir]2203-sir , everything , "[2010-the attendant] said [the attendant]2010-the attendant gravely . " Shall [I]2010-the attendant help [you]2203-sir on with [your]2203-sir costume ? "[2010-the attendant]

" Oh , hitch the bally thing on ! "[93-syme] said [Syme]93-syme impatiently .

But though [he]93-syme affected to despise [the mummery]2017-the mummery , [he]93-syme felt a curious freedom and naturalness in [his]93-syme movements as the blue and gold garment fell about [him]93-syme ; and when [he]93-syme found that [he]93-syme had to wear a sword , it stirred a boyish dream . As [he]93-syme passed out of [the room]313-the room [he]93-syme flung the folds across [his]93-syme shoulder with a gesture , [his]93-syme sword stood out at an angle , and [he]93-syme had all the swagger of a troubadour . For these disguises did not disguise , but reveal .

CHAPTER XV . [THE ACCUSER]2019-the accuser

As [Syme]93-syme strode along [the corridor]337-the corridor [he]93-syme saw [the Secretary]670-the secretary standing at the top of [a great flight of stairs]2022-a great flight of stairs . [The man]315-the man had never looked so noble . [He]315-the man was draped in a long robe of starless black , down the centre of which fell a band or broad stripe of pure white , like a single shaft of light . The whole looked like some very severe ecclesiastical vestment . There was no need for [Syme]93-syme to search [his]93-syme memory or the Bible in order to remember that the first day of creation marked the mere creation of light out of darkness . The vestment itself would alone have suggested the symbol ; and [Syme]93-syme felt also how perfectly this pattern of pure white and black expressed the soul of [the pale and austere Secretary]2024-the pale and austere secretary , with [his]315-the man inhuman veracity and [his]315-the man cold frenzy , which made [him]315-the man so easily make war on [the anarchists]2287-the anarchists , and yet so easily pass for [one of [them]2287-the anarchists]2897-one of them . [Syme]93-syme was scarcely surprised to notice that , amid all the ease and hospitality of [their]2027-their new surroundings , [this man]2311-this man 's eyes were still stern . No smell of ale or orchards could make [the Secretary]670-the secretary cease to ask a reasonable question .

If [Syme]93-syme had been able to see [himself]93-syme , [he]93-syme would have realised that [he]93-syme , too , seemed to be for the first time [himself]93-syme and [no one else]2030-no one else . For if [the Secretary]670-the secretary stood for [that philosopher who loves the original and formless light]2032-that philosopher who loves the original and formless light , [Syme]93-syme was a type of [the poet who seeks always to make the light in special shapes , to split it up into sun and star]2033-the poet who seeks always to make the light in special shapes , to split it up into sun and star . [The philosopher]2034-the philosopher may sometimes love the infinite ; [the poet]2134-the poet always loves the finite . For [him]315-the man the great moment is not the creation of light , but the creation of the sun and moon .

As [they]2027-their descended the broad stairs together [they]2027-their overtook [Ratcliffe]160-ratcliffe , who was clad in spring green like [a huntsman]2036-a huntsman , and the pattern upon whose garment was a green tangle of trees . For [he]160-ratcliffe stood for that third day on which [the earth and green things]2037-the earth and green things were made , and [his]160-ratcliffe square , sensible face , with its not unfriendly cynicism , seemed appropriate enough to it .

[They]2027-their were led out of another broad and low gateway into [a very large old English garden , full of torches and bonfires]2038-a very large old english garden , full of torches and bonfires , by the broken light of which a vast carnival of [people]2223-people were dancing in motley dress . [Syme]93-syme seemed to see every shape in Nature imitated in some crazy costume . There was [a man dressed as a windmill with enormous sails]2040-a man dressed as a windmill with enormous sails , [a man dressed as an elephant]2041-a man dressed as an elephant , [a man dressed as a balloon]2042-a man dressed as a balloon ; [the two last , together]2043-the two last , together , seemed to keep the thread of [their]2027-their farcical adventures . [Syme]93-syme even saw , with a queer thrill , one dancer dressed like an enormous hornbill , with a beak twice as big as [himself]93-syme the queer bird which had fixed itself on [his]93-syme fancy like a living question while [he]93-syme was rushing down [the long road]1841-the long road at [the Zoological Gardens]1877-the zoological gardens . There were a thousand other such objects , however . There was a dancing lamp - post , a dancing apple tree , [a dancing ship]2046-a dancing ship . [One]244-one would have thought that the untamable tune of [some mad musician]2048-some mad musician had set all the common objects of field and street dancing an eternal jig . And long afterwards , when [Syme]93-syme was middle - aged and at rest , [he]93-syme could never see one of those particular objects a lamppost , or an apple tree , or a windmill without thinking that it was [a strayed reveller from that revel of masquerade]2049-a strayed reveller from that revel of masquerade .

On one side of [this lawn]2050-this lawn , alive with [dancers]2051-dancers , was a sort of green bank , like the terrace in [such old - fashioned gardens]2052-such old - fashioned gardens .

Along this , in a kind of crescent , stood seven great chairs , the thrones of the seven days . [Gogol]126-gogol and [Dr. Bull]135-dr. bull were already in [their]2027-their seats ; [the Professor]773-the professor was just mounting to [his]773-the professor . [Gogol]126-gogol , or [Tuesday]127-tuesday , had [his]126-gogol simplicity well symbolised by a dress designed upon the division of [the waters]2054-the waters , a dress that separated upon [his]126-gogol forehead and fell to [his]126-gogol feet , grey and silver , like a sheet of rain . [The Professor , whose day was that on which the birds and fishes the ruder forms of life were created]2055-the professor , whose day was that on which the birds and fishes the ruder forms of life were created , had a dress of dim purple , over which sprawled goggle - eyed fishes and outrageous tropical birds , the union in [him]93-syme of unfathomable fancy and of doubt . [Dr. Bull]135-dr. bull , the last day of Creation , wore a coat covered with heraldic animals in red and gold , and on [his]135-dr. bull crest [a man rampant]2056-a man rampant . [He]135-dr. bull lay back in [his]135-dr. bull chair with a broad smile , the picture of [an optimist in [his]135-dr. bull element]2057-an optimist in his element .

One by one [the wanderers]2058-the wanderers ascended [the bank]856-the bank and sat in [their]2058-the wanderers strange seats . As each of [them]2058-the wanderers sat down a roar of enthusiasm rose from the carnival , such as that with which [crowds]1813-crowds receive [kings]657-kings . Cups were clashed and torches shaken , and feathered hats flung in the air . [The men for whom these thrones were reserved]2062-the men for whom these thrones were reserved were [men crowned with some extraordinary laurels]2063-men crowned with some extraordinary laurels . But the central chair was empty .

[Syme]93-syme was on the left hand of it and [the Secretary]670-the secretary on the right . [The Secretary]670-the secretary looked across the empty throne at [Syme]93-syme , and said , compressing [his]670-the secretary lips

" [We]3438-we do not know yet that [he]93-syme is not dead in a field . "[670-the secretary]

Almost as [Syme]93-syme heard the words , [he]93-syme saw on the sea of human faces in front of [him]93-syme a frightful and beautiful alteration , as if heaven had opened behind [his]93-syme head . But [Sunday]110-sunday had only passed silently along the front like a shadow , and had sat in the central seat . [He]93-syme was draped plainly , in a pure and terrible white , and [his]93-syme hair was like a silver flame on [his]93-syme forehead .

For a long time it seemed for hours that [huge masquerade of mankind]2066-huge masquerade of mankind swayed and stamped in front of [them]2067-them to marching and exultant music . [Every couple]2068-every couple dancing seemed a separate romance ; it might be [a fairy dancing with a pillar - box]2069-a fairy dancing with a pillar - box , or [a peasant girl dancing with the moon]2070-a peasant girl dancing with the moon ; but in each case it was , somehow , as absurd as [Alice in Wonderland]177-alice in wonderland , yet as grave and kind as a love story . At last , however , [the thick crowd]2071-the thick crowd began to thin itself . [Couples]2072-couples strolled away into [the garden - walks]2073-the garden - walks , or began to drift towards that end of [the building]2074-the building where stood smoking , in huge pots like fish - kettles , some hot and scented mixtures of old ale or wine . Above all these , upon a sort of black framework on the roof of [the house]3131-the house , roared in its iron basket a gigantic bonfire , which lit up [the land for miles]2076-the land for miles . It flung the homely effect of firelight over the face of vast forests of grey or brown , and it seemed to fill with warmth even the emptiness of upper night . Yet this also , after a time , was allowed to grow fainter ; [the dim groups]2077-the dim groups gathered more and more round the great cauldrons , or passed , laughing and clattering , into [the inner passages of [that ancient house]2079-that ancient house]2078-the inner passages of that ancient house . Soon there were only [some ten loiterers in [the garden]281-the garden]2080-some ten loiterers in the garden ; soon only four . Finally [the last stray merry - maker]2082-the last stray merry - maker ran into [the house]3131-the house whooping to [[his]2082-the last stray merry - maker companions]1156-his companions . The fire faded , and the slow , strong stars came out . And [the seven strange men]2085-the seven strange men were left alone , like seven stone statues on [their]2085-the seven strange men chairs of stone . [Not one of [them]2085-the seven strange men]2086-not one of them had spoken a word .

[They]2085-the seven strange men seemed in no haste to do so , but heard in silence the hum of insects and the distant song of one bird . Then [Sunday]110-sunday spoke , but so dreamily that [he]110-sunday might have been continuing a conversation rather than beginning one .

" [We]3439-we will eat and drink later , "[110-sunday] [he]110-sunday said . " Let [us]3439-we remain together a little , [we]3439-we who have loved [each other]2300-each other so sadly , and have fought so long . [I]110-sunday seem to remember only centuries of heroic war , in which [you]3441-you were always [heroes epic on epic]3442-heroes epic on epic , iliad on iliad , and [you]3441-you always [brothers in arms]3443-brothers in arms . Whether it was but recently ( for time is nothing ) , or at the beginning of [the world]182-the world , [I]110-sunday sent [you]3441-you out to war . [I]110-sunday sat in the darkness , where there is not any created thing , and to [you]3441-you [I]110-sunday was only a voice commanding valour and an unnatural virtue . [You]3441-you heard the voice in the dark , and [you]3441-you never heard it again . The sun in [heaven]890-heaven denied it , [the earth]253-the earth and sky denied it , all human wisdom denied it . And when [I]110-sunday met [you]3441-you in the daylight [I]110-sunday denied it [myself]110-sunday . "[110-sunday]

[Syme]93-syme stirred sharply in [his]93-syme seat , but otherwise there was silence , and the incomprehensible went on .

" But [you]3441-you were [men]179-men . [You]3441-you did not forget [your]3441-you secret honour , though the whole cosmos turned an engine of torture to tear it out of [you]3441-you . [I]2088-the black - browed secretary knew how near [you]3441-you were to [hell]3448-hell . [I]2088-the black - browed secretary know how [you]3441-you , [Thursday]102-thursday , crossed swords with [King Satan]157-satan , and how [you]3441-you , [Wednesday]129-wednesday , named [me]2088-the black - browed secretary in the hour without hope . "[2088-the black - browed secretary]

There was complete silence in [the starlit garden]2087-the starlit garden , and then [the black - browed Secretary]2088-the black - browed secretary , implacable , turned in [his]2088-the black - browed secretary chair towards [Sunday]110-sunday , and said in a harsh voice

" Who and what are [you]110-sunday ? "[2088-the black - browed secretary]

" [I]300-the other am [the Sabbath]3449-the sabbath , "[300-the other] said [the other]300-the other without moving . " [I]300-the other am the peace of [God]90-god . "[300-the other]

[The Secretary]670-the secretary started up , and stood crushing [his]2088-the black - browed secretary costly robe in [his]2088-the black - browed secretary hand .

" [I]2088-the black - browed secretary know what [you]110-sunday mean , "[2088-the black - browed secretary] [he]2088-the black - browed secretary cried , " and it is exactly that that [I]2088-the black - browed secretary can not forgive [you]110-sunday . [I]2088-the black - browed secretary know [you]110-sunday are contentment , optimism , what do [they]3450-they call the thing , an ultimate reconciliation . Well , [I]2088-the black - browed secretary am not reconciled . If [you]110-sunday were [the man in the dark room]3226-the man in the dark room , why were [you]110-sunday also [Sunday]110-sunday , an offense to the sunlight ? If [you]110-sunday were from [the first [[our]3453-our father]3454-our father and [[our]3453-our friend]2565-our friend]3452-the first our father and our friend , why were [you]110-sunday also [[our]3453-our greatest enemy]3456-our greatest enemy ? [We]3453-our wept , [we]3453-our fled in terror ; the iron entered into [our]3453-our souls and [you]110-sunday are the peace of [God]90-god ! Oh , [I]2088-the black - browed secretary can forgive [God]90-god [His]90-god anger , though it destroyed [nations]3457-nations ; but [I]2088-the black - browed secretary can not forgive [Him]90-god [His]90-god peace . "[2088-the black - browed secretary]

[Sunday]110-sunday answered not a word , but very slowly [he]110-sunday turned [his]110-sunday face of stone upon [Syme]93-syme as if asking a question .

" No , "[93-syme] said [Syme]93-syme , " [I]93-syme do not feel fierce like that . [I]93-syme am grateful to [you]110-sunday , not only for wine and hospitality here , but for many a fine scamper and free fight . But [I]93-syme should like to know . [My]93-syme soul and heart are as happy and quiet here as [this old garden]3458-this old garden , but [my]93-syme reason is still crying out . [I]93-syme should like to know . "[93-syme]

[Sunday]110-sunday looked at [Ratcliffe]160-ratcliffe , whose clear voice said

" It seems so _ silly _ that [you]110-sunday should have been on both sides and fought [yourself]110-sunday . "[495-a child]

[Bull]135-dr. bull said

" [I]135-dr. bull understand nothing , but [I]135-dr. bull am happy . In fact , [I]135-dr. bull am going to sleep . "[135-dr. bull]

" [I]773-the professor am not happy , "[773-the professor] said [the Professor]773-the professor with [his]773-the professor head in [his]773-the professor hands , " because [I]773-the professor do not understand . [You]773-the professor let [me]773-the professor stray a little too near to hell . "[773-the professor]

And then [Gogol]126-gogol said , with the absolute simplicity of [a child]495-a child

" [I]126-gogol wish [I]126-gogol knew why [I]126-gogol was hurt so much . "[126-gogol]

[Still Sunday]110-sunday said nothing , but only sat with [his]2093-his mighty chin upon [his]2093-his hand , and gazed at the distance . Then at last [he]2093-his said

" [I]2093-his have heard [your]773-the professor complaints in order . And here , [I]2093-his think , comes another to complain , and [we]3459-we will hear [him]2096-a black - clad figure also . "[2093-his]

The falling fire in [the great cresset]2094-the great cresset threw a last long gleam , like a bar of burning gold , across [the dim grass]2095-the dim grass . Against this fiery band was outlined in utter black the advancing legs of [a black - clad figure]2096-a black - clad figure . [He]2096-a black - clad figure seemed to have a fine close suit with knee - breeches such as that which was worn by [the servants of [the house]3131-the house]2097-the servants of the house , only that it was not blue , but of this absolute sable . [He]2096-a black - clad figure had , like [the servants]2099-the servants , a kind of sword by [his]2096-a black - clad figure side . It was only when [he]2096-a black - clad figure had come quite close to the crescent of [the seven]2100-the seven and flung up [his]2096-a black - clad figure face to look at [them]2100-the seven , that [Syme]93-syme saw , with thunder - struck clearness , that the face was the broad , almost ape - like face of [[his]2096-a black - clad figure old friend]2101-his old friend [Gregory]112-gregory , with its rank red hair and [its]112-gregory insulting smile .

" [Gregory]112-gregory ! "[93-syme] gasped [Syme]93-syme , half - rising from [his]93-syme seat . " Why , this is [the real anarchist]3460-the real anarchist ! "[93-syme]

" Yes , "[112-gregory] said [Gregory]112-gregory , with a great and dangerous restraint , " [I]112-gregory am [the real anarchist]3460-the real anarchist . "[112-gregory]

" ' Now there was a day , ' "[135-dr. bull] murmured [Bull]135-dr. bull , who seemed really to have fallen asleep , " ' when [the sons of [God]90-god]3462-the sons of god came to present [themselves]3462-the sons of god before [the Lord]3463-the lord , and [Satan]157-satan came also among [them]3462-the sons of god . ' "[135-dr. bull]

" [You]93-syme are right , "[112-gregory] said [Gregory]112-gregory , and gazed all round . " [I]112-gregory am [a destroyer]3464-a destroyer . [I]112-gregory would destroy [the world]182-the world if [I]112-gregory could . "[112-gregory]

A sense of a pathos far under [the earth]253-the earth stirred up in [Syme]93-syme , and [he]93-syme spoke brokenly and without sequence .

" Oh , [most unhappy man]3466-most unhappy man , "[93-syme] [he]93-syme cried , " try to be happy ! [You]3466-most unhappy man have red hair like [[your]3466-most unhappy man sister]3467-your sister . "[93-syme]

" [My]112-gregory red hair , like red flames , shall burn up [the world]182-the world , "[112-gregory] said [Gregory]112-gregory . " [I]112-gregory thought [I]112-gregory hated everything more than [common men]3469-common men can hate anything ; but [I]112-gregory find that [I]112-gregory do not hate everything so much as [I]112-gregory hate [you]3466-most unhappy man ! "[112-gregory]

" [I]93-syme never hated [you]3466-most unhappy man , "[93-syme] said [Syme]93-syme very sadly .

Then out of [this unintelligible creature the last thunders]2103-this unintelligible creature the last thunders broke .

" [You]3466-most unhappy man ! "[93-syme] [he]93-syme cried . " [You]3466-most unhappy man never hated because [you]3466-most unhappy man never lived . [I]93-syme know what [you]3466-most unhappy man are all of [you]3466-most unhappy man , from first to last [you]3466-most unhappy man are [the people in power]3470-the people in power ! [You]3466-most unhappy man are [the police]2193-the police [the great fat , smiling men in blue and buttons]3472-the great fat , smiling men in blue and buttons ! [You]3466-most unhappy man are the Law , and [you]3466-most unhappy man have never been broken . But is there [a free soul alive]3473-a free soul alive that does not long to break [you]3466-most unhappy man , only because [you]3466-most unhappy man have never been broken ? [We]3474-we in revolt talk all kind of nonsense doubtless about this crime or that crime of [the Government]3475-the government . It is all folly ! The only crime of [the Government]3475-the government is that it governs . The unpardonable sin of the supreme power is that it is supreme . [I]93-syme do not curse [you]3466-most unhappy man for being cruel . [I]93-syme do not curse [you]3466-most unhappy man ( though [I]93-syme might ) for being kind . [I]93-syme curse [you]3466-most unhappy man for being safe ! [You]3466-most unhappy man sit in [your]3466-most unhappy man chairs of stone , and have never come down from them . [You]3466-most unhappy man are [the seven angels of heaven]3477-the seven angels of heaven , and [you]3466-most unhappy man have had no troubles . Oh , [I]93-syme could forgive [you]3466-most unhappy man everything , [you]3466-most unhappy man that rule [all mankind]3478-all mankind , if [I]93-syme could feel for once that [you]3466-most unhappy man had suffered for one hour a real agony such as [I]93-syme "[93-syme]

[Syme]93-syme sprang to [his]93-syme feet , shaking from head to foot .

" [I]93-syme see everything , "[93-syme] [he]93-syme cried , " everything that there is . Why does each thing on [the earth]253-the earth war against [each other thing]3480-each other thing ? Why does each small thing in [the world]182-the world have to fight against [the world]182-the world [itself]182-the world ? Why does a fly have to fight [the whole universe]3483-the whole universe ? Why does a dandelion have to fight [the whole universe]3483-the whole universe ? For the same reason that [I]93-syme had to be alone in [the dreadful Council of the Days]3485-the dreadful council of the days . So that [each thing that obeys law]3486-each thing that obeys law may have the glory and isolation of [the anarchist]3487-the anarchist . So that [each man fighting for order]3488-each man fighting for order may be as brave and good [a man]240-a man as [the dynamiter]3490-the dynamiter . So that the real lie of [Satan]157-satan may be flung back in the face of [this blasphemer]3491-this blasphemer , so that by tears and torture [we]3492-we may earn the right to say to [this man]2311-this man , ' [You]2311-this man lie ! ' No agonies can be too great to buy the right to say to [this accuser]3494-this accuser , ' [We]3492-we also have suffered . ' "[93-syme]

" It is not true that [we]3492-we have never been broken . [We]3492-we have been broken upon the wheel . It is not true that [we]3492-we have never descended from these thrones . [We]3492-we have descended into hell . [We]3492-we were complaining of unforgettable miseries even at the very moment when [this man]2311-this man entered insolently to accuse [us]3492-we of happiness . [I]125-memnon repel the slander ; [we]3492-we have not been happy . At least "[125-memnon]

[He]2104-he had turned [his]2104-he eyes so as to see suddenly the great face of [Sunday]110-sunday , which wore a strange smile .

" Have [you]110-sunday , "[2104-he] [he]2104-he cried in a dreadful voice , " have [you]110-sunday ever suffered ? "[2104-he]

As [he]2104-he gazed , the great face grew to an awful size , grew larger than the colossal mask of [Memnon]125-memnon , which had made [him]2104-he scream as [a child]495-a child . It grew larger and larger , filling the whole sky ; then everything went black . Only in the blackness before it entirely destroyed [his]2104-he brain [he]2104-he seemed to hear a distant voice saying a commonplace text that [he]2104-he had heard somewhere , " Can [ye]110-sunday drink of the cup that [I]2104-he drink of ? "[2104-he]

When [men in books awake from a vision]2106-men in books awake from a vision , [they]2106-men in books awake from a vision commonly find [themselves]2106-men in books awake from a vision in some place in which [they]2106-men in books awake from a vision might have fallen asleep ; [they]2106-men in books awake from a vision yawn in a chair , or lift [themselves]2106-men in books awake from a vision with bruised limbs from a field . [Syme]93-syme 's experience was something much more psychologically strange if there was indeed anything unreal , in the earthly sense , about the things [he]93-syme had gone through . For while [he]2104-he could always remember afterwards that [he]2104-he had swooned before the face of [Sunday]110-sunday , [he]2104-he could not remember having ever come to at all . [He]2104-he could only remember that gradually and naturally [he]2104-he knew that [he]2104-he was and had been walking along [a country lane]2107-a country lane with [an easy and conversational companion]2108-an easy and conversational companion . [That companion]2109-that companion had been a part of [his]2104-he recent drama ; it was [the red - haired poet [Gregory]112-gregory]2110-the red - haired poet gregory . [They]2111-they were walking like [old friends]2112-old friends , and were in the middle of a conversation about some triviality . But [Syme]93-syme could only feel an unnatural buoyancy in [his]2104-he body and a crystal simplicity in [his]2104-he mind that seemed to be superior to everything that [he]2104-he said or did . [He]93-syme felt [he]2104-he was in possession of some impossible good news , which made every other thing a triviality , but an adorable triviality .

Dawn was breaking over everything in colours at once clear and timid ; as if [Nature]174-nature made a first attempt at yellow and a first attempt at rose . A breeze blew so clean and sweet , that [one]244-one could not think that it blew from the sky ; it blew rather through some hole in the sky . [Syme]93-syme felt a simple surprise when [he]93-syme saw rising all round [him]93-syme on both sides of [the road]299-the road [the red , irregular buildings of [Saffron Park]2-saffron park]2115-the red , irregular buildings of saffron park . [He]93-syme had no idea that [he]93-syme had walked so near [London]3-london . [He]93-syme walked by instinct along [one white road , on which early birds hopped and sang]2116-one white road , on which early birds hopped and sang , and found [himself]93-syme outside [a fenced garden]2117-a fenced garden . There [he]93-syme saw [the sister of [Gregory]112-gregory]2118-the sister of gregory , [the girl with the gold - red hair]2119-the girl with the gold - red hair , cutting lilac before breakfast , with the great unconscious gravity of [a girl]2120-a girl .
